attributes.action: Reopen Hartlepool Hospital A and E
attributes.additional_details: The people of Hartlepool Now have to attend the one life mecial center for all accident and emergencys as the main hospitals department was closed down, The one life from day one has been a Nightmare, There are consistently making errors and mistakes and people have nearly died from there mistakes on several ocassions, The staff at one life seem to be very ill trained and do not really have the patients interests at heart,You only have to look at the local papers to see that this place needs closing down and the services being moved back to the main hospital,This needs to happen fast before people die or become seriously ill.
